location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tabreze to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tabreze [Tabriz, Iran] to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, informing that Coja Arratoon Astwatsatoor was appointed to work at Bushire to forward letters received from Persia to His Majesty's Envoy Extraordinary, and requesting Bruce to pay him fifty piasters Eyn per month.
